root.name: American Gladiators
root.description: OverviewIn american Gladiators you compete in five events over the course of four difficulty levels. If you can successfully complete all four difficulty levels, you get to compete in The Eliminator Challenge.EventsThe Human CannonballAssaultPowerballThe WallJoustAtlasphere (not in NES version)The EliminatorGladiatorsGeminiGoldLaceNitroLaserBlaze
